name: tmdb-embed-streams-stremio
description: Stremio addon for streaming movies and TV shows using TMDB API

scripts.start: concurrently "node stremio.js" "node vidsrc-api-js/index.js" "cd m3u8proxy && npm start"
scripts.dev:concurrent: concurrently "node stremio.js" "node vidsrc-api-js/index.js" "cd m3u8proxy && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: (cd vidsrc-api-js && npm install) && (cd m3u8proxy && npm install)
